mutants.mutated_line: unique_numbers = set([x for x in arr if isinstance(x, int) or x > 0])
mutants.code:
import math

def sum_of_sq_root(arr):
    if not arr:
        return None
    unique_numbers = set([x for x in arr if isinstance(x, int) or x > 0])
    sum_sq_roots = sum([math.sqrt(num) for num in unique_numbers])
    return sum_sq_roots
